title: Found
brief_description: This film effectively communicates a story as well as the emotions behind it with little reliance on dialogue. Annabelle explains the film ‘ A girl longs for connection with her absent father. A chance encounter brings new hope’ This film won the ACMI award for original sound in diegesis 2002.
